title: Major milestone hit in ALS drug treatment thanks to Ice Bucket Challenge
description: Scientists have reached a major milestone in drug treatment for ALS. Many doctors say the success was accelerated by the Ice Bucket Challenge in the summer of 2014.

title: Some police departments overhaul use of force training
description: Recent deadly encounters have drawn renewed attention to law enforcement tactics. Now police departments around the country are changing how they train new recruits.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Miami-Dade school district targeted by cyber attacks
description: Virtual school for most students in Miami-Dade was offline for a third day after being hit by cyber attacks. Experts say schools are especially vulnerable to cyber attacks, because in the ramp-up to virtual learning, little money was earmarked for security.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Nancy Pelosi under fire for haircut inside San Francisco salon despite COVID orders
description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was seen on security footage inside a San Francisco hair salon, which was not cleared for indoor service. Pelosi insisted the salon told her it was allowed.
